DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine efficacy safety different dos SKI3246 compare placebo treatment patient irritable bowel syndrome non-constipation .
DOC.brief_title: Study Assess Efficacy Safety SKI3246 Subjects With Non-Constipation Irritable Bowel Syndrome
DOC.criteria: Have diagnose nonconstipation ROME III . Patients voluntarily sign write informed consent may participate study . Pregnant lactate female . Patients history inflammatory bowel disease . Severe neurological psychological disease History allergic reaction medication use study Use investigational drug within 30 day prior study . Patients investigator consider ineligible study
